title: Can't press login button when entering my user and password
body: Hi everyone. I've been experiencing some problems with league since yesterday; first of all, I had the infinite loop problem but a lot of people had it too. I decided then to unistall and reinstall the game again. That's fine. Ever since this morning everytime I enter my user and password the login button remains grayed out, and i can't access the game. I've tried everything (i'm sure i'm connecting to the right server). HELP!

replies.body: If that login button grayed out it means that your network hasn't been able to establish a reliable connection to our login servers. Let's check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly and make sure that you update your port forwarding and DNS as well.
